Popped Corn.name: Popped Corn
Popped Corn.description: Effectively no different than a normal bowl of popcorn, but it's still impressive!

Ratatouey.name: Ratatouey
Ratatouey.description: Hey cmon man how should I know how to spell Ratatouille, there's no France remember?

Kiwi Fruit.name: Kiwi Fruit
Kiwi Fruit.description: Is there a reason these are so hard to cook? Are you just like... cutting it in half?

Sausy Sausage.name: Sausy Sausage
Sausy Sausage.description: Plump innit! Would go great with some mommy milk!

Double Cherry.name: Double Cherry
Double Cherry.description: So like... why did the yellow circle want these again? This bonus is pretty bad.

Wrath Grapes.name: Wrath Grapes
Wrath Grapes.description: I'd be angry too if I were a grape.

Giant Tomato.name: Giant Tomato
Giant Tomato.description: It's big, it's large, it's round, it's red, and it'll fill you up thats for sure!

Head Chef Bread.name: Head Chef Bread
Head Chef Bread.description: How DARE you question the honorable Chef Geustloaf's cooking abilities!
